definitions.definition: Of, relating to, near, involving, or supplying the cheek .
examples: buccal branch of the facial nerve

definitions.definition: Of, relating to, or lying in the mouth .
Administered in the mouth , not by swallowing but by absorption through the skin of the cheek ; often by placing between the top gum and the inside of the lip .

main_definition: ( anatomy , dentistry , relational ) Of, relating to, near, involving, or supplying the cheek .
secondary_definitions: Of, relating to, or lying in the mouth .
( pharmacology ) Administered in the mouth , not by swallowing but by absorption through the skin of the cheek ; often by placing between the top gum and the inside of the lip .
( linguistics ) supralaryngeal, not laryngeal or glottal.
